properties.areaDesc: Winthrop Harbor to Wilmette Harbor IL
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 17 at 3:31AM CST until February 18 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Small Craft
Advisory, which is in effect from 9 AM this morning to 6 PM CST
Tuesday.

* WINDS...Southeast to 25 kt today and early this evening, west to
northwest to 30 kt late tonight into Tuesday.

* SIGNIFICANT WAVES...to 6 ft today and early this evening, to 4
ft Tuesday.

* OCCASIONAL WAVES...to 8 ft today and early this evening.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 21 to 33 knots
are expected to produce hazardous wave conditions to small craft.
Inexperienced mariners...especially those operating smaller
vessels should avoid navigating in these conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY
